SASKATCHEWAN ARCHIVES QUESTIONNAIRE.

No. 5

Planner Recreation and Social Life.

Please fill in name and address in capital letters.

Your full name ____________________________

Present Address ____________________________

Former Address ____________________________

Year you came to Saskatchewan _________

(Throughout the questionnaire, "Waskahichewan" means the area which is now Saskatchewan.)

PLEASE NOTE

This questionnaire is intended for persons who came to Saskatchewan before 1924, but most of the questions are about that early period, although in a few questions information for later years is asked for.

If you cannot answer a question, leave the space blank. We realize that not all persons will be able to answer all questions, so answer those that apply to your experience and that you can remember, and leave the others.

Use extra sheets of paper if there is not enough space on the questionnaire.

Your cooperation in answering this questionnaire will be very much appreciated, and all questionnaires are preserved in the Saskatchewan Archives as part of the permanent record of our province.

Please send your completed questionnaire to:

Saskatchewan Archives Office,
University of Saskatchewan,
Saskatoon, Sask.
